faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How can I change my plan?
faq.answer1: You can change your plan at any time from your dashboard. The change will take effect on your next billing period.
faq.answer2: Yes, we offer a 30-day money-back guarantee if you're not satisfied with your subscription.
faq.answer3: Absolutely. There are no long-term commitments, and you can cancel your subscription at any time.
faq.answer4: Yes, all content and feature updates are automatically available for your subscription tier.

projects.title: Projects and Challenges
projects.subtitle: Apply your knowledge with concrete quantitative finance projects
projects.optionPricingTitle: Local Volatility Option Pricing Tool Development
projects.optionPricingDesc: Create an option pricing tool integrating local volatility models to better capture smile and skew effects.
projects.monteCarloTitle: Monte Carlo Simulation for Exotic Options
projects.monteCarloDesc: Implement a Monte Carlo pricing solution for various path-dependent exotic options.
projects.portfolioOptDesc: Create an optimization algorithm to build option portfolios meeting various risk constraints.
projects.volSurfaceDesc: Develop a tool to calibrate and visualize volatility surfaces from market data.
projects.algoTradingDesc: Design and backtest an algorithmic trading strategy for options based on volatility anomalies.
projects.previousChallenge: Previous Challenge: Interest Rate Curve Modeling
projects.communityDescription: Participate in challenging projects, share your knowledge, and progress with other quantitative finance enthusiasts.

quizzes.title: Progressive Quizzes
quizzes.subtitle: Evaluate your knowledge of financial options
quizzes.fundamentalsDesc: Master the basic concepts of financial options: structure, pricing, and fundamental mechanisms.
quizzes.pricingDesc: Test your knowledge on Black-Scholes, binomial trees, and numerical methods.
quizzes.greeksDesc: Evaluate your understanding of sensitivity measures and hedging strategies.
quizzes.volatilityDesc: Test your knowledge of implied volatility, historical volatility, and volatility surfaces.
quizzes.exoticDesc: Evaluate your mastery of path-dependent options, barrier options, and multi-asset options.
quizzes.strategiesDesc: Put your knowledge of complex strategies and arbitrage to the test.
quizzes.survivalDesc: Ready to put your knowledge to the test? Survival mode combines questions from all categories with a time limit for a complete challenge.
